divs: Sighting Detailsmy son was out side walking his dog, when he yelled for me to come out side fast. stood in drive way and watched the object float then suddenly picked up speed and disappeared in 3 sec.
Summary: day time, big as a house, started to change shape as it moved to north west
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Mason
There were no other sightings in Mason on or around October 15th 2005
